TopicTitle: Part of the KSC missing in Galileo Planet Pack

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I recently installed GPP only to find out that part of the KSC is missing. I'm using the latest version of the mod, and the game is not showing any errors. I have no idea what to do about this. 

Image: https://imgur.com/a/54YJ1

Will need more info. See my signature for a link on how to get support. 

Also, post in the GPP thread when you have issues. Mod devs don't always surf the unread threads section. I happened to have seen this in passing. Otherwise your issues will most likely go unseen and unanswered.
